Articles.Content:
Taking a break from grinding the career this week, Do things a little differently and taking to teh sandbox to make a very different beast from normal 

A originally threatened this back early in my career playthrough and with the strike currently going on with ship design I thought now might be the time to release this beauty 

Please sit back and enjoy, this, The first ever Kerbal Space Center International Open
